data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ben-Dov, Yair (2015): Description of a new species of Odonaspis Leonardi (Hemiptera: Coccomorpha: Diaspididae) from Australia. Zootaxa 3980 (3): 447-449, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3980.3.9
